title: Report a Safety Hazard
description: An associate discovers a liquid spill on the floor and needs to report it so it can be cleaned up.

tasks.description: Place a 'wet floor' sign over the spill to warn customers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The immediate hazard is marked to prevent accidents.

tasks.description: Use the store communication device to report the spill and its location to the manager on duty.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager is made aware of the situation.

tasks.description: A task is created in the task management system for 'Clean up spill in Aisle 3' and assigned for immediate action.
tasks.expected_outcome: The hazard is formally logged and assigned for resolution.
